        参数:
        soundId -
        uLoop - loop mode (0 = no loop, -1 = loop forever)
        rate -
        返回:

      • stop

        public void stop(int streamID)
        Stop a playback stream. Stop the stream specified by the streamID. This is the value returned by the play() function. If the stream is playing, it will be stopped. It also releases any native resources associated with this stream. If the stream is not playing, it will have no effect. a streamID returned by the play() function
        参数:
        streamID - a streamID returned by the play() function
